resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106823</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106823</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202551</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Descriptive Writing Using Landscape Scenes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beschreibendes Schreiben Mit Landschaftsszenen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écriture Descriptive En utilisant des Scènes 
d'Horizontal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita Descritiva Usando Cenas Da Paisagem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura Descrittiva Usando Le Scene Di 
Paesaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιγραφικές σκηνές τοπίων γραψίματος χρησιμοποιώντας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escritura Descriptiva Usando Escenas Del Paisaje</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson focuses on the descriptive writing process through the use of landscape scenes, the Paragraph Writing Strategy from the University of Kansas Institute for Research in Learning, and the 4MAT Instructional Model.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion konzentriert auf den beschreibenden 
Schreiben Prozeß durch den Gebrauch von Landschaftsszenen, die 
Paragraph-Schreiben Strategie von der Universität des Kansas 
Instituts für Forschung, beim Lernen und das anweisende Modell 4MAT.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon se concentre sur le processus 
descriptif d'écriture par l'utilisation des scènes d'horizontal, la 
stratégie d'écriture de paragraphe de l'université de l'institut du
Kansas pour la recherche dans l'étude, et le modèle 4MAT 
d'instruction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição focaliza no processo descritivo da 
escrita com o uso de cenas da paisagem, na estratégia da escrita do 
parágrafo da universidade do instituto de Kansas para a pesquisa na 
aprendizagem, e no modelo 4MAT instrutivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione mette a fuoco sul processo 
descrittivo di scrittura con l'uso delle scene di paesaggio, sulla 
strategia di scrittura di paragrafo dall'università di istituto del 
Kansas per ricerca nell'imparare e sul modello didattico 4MAT.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εστιάζει στην περιγραφική διαδικασία 
γραψίματος μέσω της χρήσης των σκηνών τοπίων, τη στρατηγική 
γραψίματος παραγράφου από το πανεπιστήμιο του ιδρύματος του 
Κάνσας για την έρευνα στην εκμάθηση, και το 4MAT εκπαιδευτικό 
μοντέλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se centra en el proceso descriptivo 
de la escritura con el uso de las escenas del paisaje, la estrategia 
de la escritura del párrafo de la universidad del instituto de Kansas
para la investigación en aprender, y el modelo educacional 4MAT.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ROSEMARY REICHSTETTER
FN:ROSEMARY REICHSTETTER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106823</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/descriptive-writing-using-landscape-scenes</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
